member.name: T:Alaris.Algorithm.STLN001A
member.summary: Alaris Earnings Volatility Trading Algorithm.

remarks.para:
Implements Atilgan (2014) earnings calendar spread strategy with:
Yang-Zhang (2000) realised volatility estimation
Leung-Santoli (2014) pre-earnings IV modelling
Healy (2021) American option pricing under negative rates
Production validation (cost survival, vega independence, liquidity, gamma risk)

Strategy workflow (10 phases):
Universe selection: symbols with earnings in target window
Market data acquisition: historical bars, options chains, earnings calendar
Realised volatility: Yang-Zhang OHLC estimator
Term structure analysis: 30/60/90 DTE IV
Signal generation: Atilgan criteria evaluation
Production validation: 4-stage validator pipeline
Position sizing: Kelly criterion
Execution pricing: IBKR snapshot quotes
Order execution: LEAN combo orders
Audit trail: Alaris.Events logging

member.name: T:Alaris.Algorithm.Universe.STUN001A
member.summary: Universe selection model that filters for symbols with upcoming earnings. Implements Atilgan (2014) pre-screening criteria.

remarks.para: Selection criteria (from Atilgan 2014): - Minimum 30-day average dollar volume: $1.5M - Minimum price: $5.00 - Earnings announcement in T+[5,7] days - Options available with sufficient liquidity
The universe refreshes daily at market open, querying the earnings calendar provider for symbols with announcements in the target window.

member.name: T:Alaris.Algorithm.Universe.STUN001B
member.summary: Polygon-based universe selection model that uses pre-generated universe files. Component ID: STUN001B (Alternative to STUN001A)

remarks.para: This selector reads from universe files generated by 'alaris universe generate': - Location: Alaris.Lean/Data/equity/usa/fundamental/coarse/{yyyyMMdd}.csv - Format: symbolId,ticker,close,volume,dollarVolume
Use this selector when LEAN fundamental data is not available. Run 'alaris universe generate' before backtesting to create the universe files.

member.name: M:Alaris.Algorithm.Universe.STUN001B.LoadEarningsSymbols(QuantConnect.Algorithm.QCAlgorithm,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Loads earnings symbols by querying SEC EDGAR for top universe stocks. For backtesting, we use historical 8-K filings (which IS what happened). SEC EDGAR stores actual filing dates, not future predictions.
